page.content:
ENTERTAINMENT
Two long-established groups who have provided entertainment for their fellow villagers are the Hand-bell Ringers and the Village Players. Other groups include badminton, cricket, bowls, golf, painting and a village dance band called Quicksilver.
Most of these groups meet in the Gaskell Hall which serves as the village hall. Most Saturdays fund-raising events, mostly coffee-mornings, are held in this hall.
The golf club is situated between the railway and the Row. The bowls club has a green off Cove Road and the cricket club has a ground off Spring Bank.
